EmailTemplate.description: Western Union Licence Registration - S75 Further Information Required 2nd Reminder
EmailTemplate.name: Western Union Licence Registration - S75 Further Info Required 2nd Reminder
EmailTemplate.subject: {!Membership__c.Name} Western Union Licence Registration â€“ S75 Further Information Required 2nd Reminder
EmailTemplate.textOnly:
Organisation Name: {!Membership__c.Account__c} {!Membership__c.Name}
Dear Licensee,
On the {!Membership__c.S75_Missing_Information_Date__c} we contacted you requesting missing information regarding your S75 notice, to date we have not received the required information.
Please forward originally requested missing information as we are unable to continue processing your application until this is received.
If you require more information, please contact Workforce Due Diligence at aml.dataentry@auspost.com.au or 03 9322 0621
Kind regards,
Workforce Due Diligence
Australia Post will never send you an email asking for your password, credit card details or account information.
This email was sent by Australia Post, 111 Bourke Street, MELBOURNE VIC 3000. If you have any concerns, or don't think you should have received this email, please email aml.dataentry@auspost.com.au. Visit ourpost.com.au for further information on our online security.
